title: Please re-add Revive and Clairvoyance because of the Summoner Specialist Rune
body:
With this rune, there is a vast majority of players wanting these runes to return.
As a support main, trading flash for Clairvoyance would be super safe and would create alot of protection of incoming ganks.
Revive is also a good summoner spell if it could be re-added due to making you respawn faster ir long games and helping yourself to get to the lane faster.

Please Riot, re-add them for the sake of the Summoner Specialist Rune!

replies.body:
Clairvoyance, yes.

Revive, no. Trolls take this and abuse it to feed the enemy quicker.
I honestly don’t want to see that again.
Trolls will still be trolls whether revive is there or not
This. 20 deaths or 40: if the division is better than of wood 2, a feeder will lose the game equally well.

did someone mention revive?

To be fair tanks using the turret destruction rune, kinda negates the whole rift herald thing too.

;w; considering I just watched two tanks hit a turret for half health each.

i'm pretty sure they'd either make rift a special case and/or modify the spell. 

In that form i honestly don't see it coming back. Either the invulnerability OR the AS buff with an added dmg buff but not both.
I like the idea of it making the tower shots splash to wipe minions, and attack significantly faster. That way it can get through minions or start pumping damage into the enemy tank a lot faster.

The AS buff is definitely the least harmful effect, If anything i would hope the tower would convert into a laser tower for the 7 seconds to clear the minions faster and punish the diver quicker? This would be useful for farmers. But then it would also cause a problem because they'll be too safe to farm with like Nasus and yoric who quickly turn deadly if they remain unchecked.
Don't forget Clarity.  I always thought that brought its own interesting gameplay (in lane and sieges at least).
i think clarity is still a summoner. it's still listed on the league page.

> [{quoted}](name=robot takeover,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=88rAO8y6,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2017-10-14T04:09:16.517+0000)
>
> i think clarity is still a summoner. it's still listed on the league page.

Yeah, but it's ARAM-only now, he probably meant on Rift

Yeah I think it should be available on SR.  I think to provide it some more interesting, direct gameplay, it could be given some changes similar to Heal.  I wouldn't say  a movement speed boost (would just be too lame), but something noticeable.

That just seems so redundant though. There's so many options for mana these days that you don't really need it after backing 1-3 times.

In aram i can see why it's there because you can't back. But even then i'd rather not have it because it'll become semi useless.
In ARAM, it can be game changing early. If you have a bunch of mages early, being able to give them another rotation early can be super impactful during the initial skirmishes
yeah that's why i can see it's use in aram.
I honestly really don't like the shaving of available summoner spells. Clairvoyance was AWESOME to use for vision-control games.
bring revive back so i can play suicide {{item:3070}}  {{champion:30}} {{item:3070}} again
I wasn't around when Revive was, but I'd love to see it.

I was mostly a noob spell, a crutch for bad players, but not as helpful as one would expect.

some people used it to troll, but others ({{champion:30}} ) could really abuse it to become MUCH more powerful. It was either a niche pick, or a waste of a pick.

I think it was removed because of the trolling potential, but with characters like {{champion:432}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:429}} introduced since that time, I don't think it's a valid argument anymore.

With the new Rune it could become very VERY useful. It could be used both early or late, and then traded out when useful. Summoner Spell Specialist opens up so many wonderful options.
This would also make the Rune viable for anyone else beside hyper aggresive laners who run {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:3}}  Early to change it into {{summoner:12}} {{summoner:4}}  later.
Yeah, and besides they'd probably want something more aggressive anyway.
Don't forget clarity too.
oooooooo I like this idea!!

Revive + Teleport + Death Timer Reduction Runes + Boots of Lucidity + Summoner's Insight and run it down lane.

Clairvoyance = God level support.

Well, maybe not readd those, but I'd definitely love to see more spells added. Today's spells feel outdated and barely offers any choice, adding at least 5 or 6 new spells would do the trick, with clairvoyance and revive or without them, I don't care
We don't need Clairvoyance back because they gave that mechanic to the blue trinkets.
I used to think clairvoyance was terrible but I then learnt the importance of vision after laning phase. Really I'd take it every game if I could now.
this keystone would still suck
Rally please. I miss using it with Jarvin for double flag power.
